radiographic_examinations.findings: Right subphrenic collection; the TIPS stent was patent with normal-direction blood flow.
No evidence to suggest reaccumulation of the subphrenic collection.
Patent TIPS stent with normal-direction blood flow.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Rapid radiological and clinical improvement of diskitis after treatment.
